page.title: 13CUSTOMS
page.content:
{ {Denholme Gala,}organised by the {British Legion}each July, begins with a{parade}through the village of the {Gala Queen}and her attendants, often a band and decorated floats. Arriving at the park there are{displays, }a{ {funfair }and{sideshows.
Each Easter the{Toddlers' Club}arrange an Easter bonnet competition and the intricate creations and their wearers always attract much attention.
{Oxenhope Straw Race}is a race where two people carry a{bale of straw, drinking a{pint of beer}(half a pint for ladies) at three pubs on the way finishing at the Dog and Gun (0434). Attracting many spectators both the entrance fees and collections are given to local charities.
